title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Frankfurt am Main, Germany
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Frankfurt am Main, Germany 
Weitere Informationen und Anmeldung: GDCR13 (http://www.softwerkskammer.org/activities/global-day-of-code-retreat-frankfurt-2013) 
Sponsors: itemis (http://www.itemis.de/),Â  Namics (http://www.namics.de/)

I'll be traveling right around this time from NYC to Hameln, and am attempting to figure out how my travel plans can include a Code Retreat. Frankfurt seems a natural place to take a stopover, and being near the Hbf would give me an easy way to get to Hameln afterward. Would it be appropriate for a non-German speaker (I understand a tiny bit) to attend?
Hi Amitai, 
of cause it would be appropriate. :-) Hope to see you at out event! 
Best
Sven
Alles in Ordnung! See you there. :-)
